title: reinstalling game patcher doesnt open
body:
i was installing league again
it finished the patcher would flash the logo and run the process for the patcher and launcher but have no program to pull up
tried reinstalling twice and had same problem 

i appreciate any help {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: What do you mean exactly by run the process for the patcher and launcher?  Does something come up after the logo, or are you stuck at the logo?  I have an idea of what might be happening, but let me know to be sure!  Let me know!
